alert.note: Alert for De Witt; Gonzales; Karnes; Lavaca; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 24 at 9:15AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of DeWitt, eastern Karnes, Gonzales, west central Lavaca and east central Wilson Counties through 1000 AM CST... At 915 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nixon, or 11 miles east of Stockdale, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cuero, Gonzales, Yoakum, Yorktown, Nixon, Runge, Smiley, Nordheim, Pandora, Gillett, Cheapside, Hochheim, Palmeto State Park, Westhoff, Leesville, Cotton Patch, Edgar, Oak Forest, Belmont and Choate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: De Witt; Gonzales; Karnes; Lavaca; Wilson
